### DS 입문

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)

library(gt)
library(gtExtras)

ds_url <- "https://statkclee.github.io/yonsei/"
ds_html <- read_html(ds_url)

ds_html |> 
  html_elements('table') |> 
  html_table() %>%
  .[[1]] |> 
  slice(2:n()) |> 
  separate(X2, into = c("학습내용", "날짜"), sep = "-") |> 
  separate(학습내용, into = c("주차", "학습내용"), sep = "\\.") |> 
  select(주차, 학습내용, 날짜) |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  mutate(날짜 = str_trim(날짜),
         학습내용 = str_trim(학습내용))  |> 
  mutate(날짜 = if_else(str_detect(날짜, "^\\d"), 날짜, NA_character_))  |> 
  gt() |> 
    gt_theme_pff() |> 
    sub_missing(
      columns = 날짜,
    missing_text = "-"
    )  |> 
    cols_align("center") |> 
    opt_table_font(
      font = list(
        google_font(name = "Sunflower"),
        "NanumGothic"
      )
    ) %>% 
    tab_style(
      style = list(
        "font-variant: small-caps;"
      ),
      locations = cells_body(columns = everything())
    ) %>% 
    tab_header(
      title =
        htmltools::tagList(
          htmltools::tags$div(
            style = htmltools::css(
              `text-align` = "center"
            ),
            htmltools::HTML(
              web_image("img/curriculum_yonsei.png")
            )
          ),
          htmltools::tags$div(
            htmltools::tags$strong("연세대"),
            "데이터 사이언스 입문"
          )
        )
    ) |> 
  tab_options(
    table.width = "65%",
    heading.title.font.size = px(12)
  )
  
```

-   [연세대 "데이터 과학 입문"](https://statkclee.github.io/yonsei/)

### GS 칼텍스

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

citizen_courses <- read_excel(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/curriculum_2023.xlsx"), sheet = "level_01")

citizen_courses %>% 
  fill(c(일정, 과정)) %>% 
  mutate(과정 = str_remove(과정, "^\\d+\\.\\s+")) %>% 
  group_by(일정, 과정, 데이터셋) %>%
    summarize(과정상세 = str_c(과정상세, collapse = "<br>")) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  relocate(데이터셋, .after = 과정상세) |>
  ## 표 작성
  gt() %>%
  gt_theme_pff() %>% 
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      "font-variant: small-caps;"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(columns = everything())
  ) |> 
  sub_missing(columns = everything(),
              missing_text = "-") |> 
  fmt_markdown(columns = TRUE) |> 
  tab_options(
    table.width = "100%",
    heading.title.font.size = px(12)
  ) |> 
  cols_align("center") |> 
  opt_table_font(
      font = list(
        google_font(name = "Sunflower"),
        "NanumGothic"
      )
    ) %>% 
  tab_header(
    title =
      htmltools::tagList(
        htmltools::tags$div(
          style = htmltools::css(
            `text-align` = "center"
          ),
          htmltools::HTML(
            web_image("img/curriculum_gs_caltex.png")
          )
        ),
        htmltools::tags$div(
          htmltools::tags$strong("GS 칼텍스"),
          "시민 데이터 과학"
        )
      )
  )
  
```

- [GS 칼텍스 데이터 사이언스](https://r2bit.com/curriculum/)

### 챗GPT DS {.smaller}

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
extrafont::loadfonts()

curriculum_raw <- read_excel(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/건국대_커리큘럼.xlsx"))

curriculum <- curriculum_raw %>% 
  fill(everything(), .direction="down") %>% 
  mutate(날짜 = as.Date(날짜)) %>% 
  mutate(주차 = glue::glue("{주차} 주차"))

## 첫번째
curriculum_first <- curriculum %>% 
  filter(dplyr::row_number() <=10)

curriculum_first_gt <- curriculum_first %>%   
  gt(groupname_col = c("주차", "날짜")) %>% 
    cols_align(align = "center") %>% 
  opt_table_font(
    font = list(
      google_font(name = "Sunflower"),
      "NanumGothic"
    )
  ) %>% 
  gt_theme_pff() %>% 
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      "font-variant: small-caps;"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(columns = everything())
  ) %>% 
  tab_header(
    title =
      htmltools::tagList(
        htmltools::tags$div(
          style = htmltools::css(
            `text-align` = "center"
          ),
          htmltools::HTML(
            web_image("img/konkuk/tools.png")
          )
        ),
        htmltools::tags$div(
          htmltools::tags$strong("챗GPT 데이터 사이언스"),
          "건국대 전문교육과정"
        )
      )
  ) 

## 두번째
curriculum_second <- curriculum %>% 
  filter(dplyr::row_number() > 10)

curriculum_second_gt <- curriculum_second %>%   
  gt(groupname_col = c("주차", "날짜")) %>% 
    cols_align(align = "center") %>% 
  opt_table_font(
    font = list(
      google_font(name = "Sunflower"),
      "NanumGothic"
    )
  ) %>% 
  gt_theme_pff() %>% 
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      "font-variant: small-caps;"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(columns = everything())
  ) 

## 결합

listed_tables <- list(curriculum_first_gt, curriculum_second_gt)

gt_two_column_layout(listed_tables)
```
